title: Dusk Till Dawn
description: At one point in her life, she was drowning in the deep but she fought and swum to stay afloat. Eden has learned to survive. She was fine living life for her son and did not need another person until Joaquim crept into her life like the morning sunlight filtering through the darkness. He tempts her with a hope that someone flawed and scarred like her can't dare to believe in.It has been long since Joaquim was drawn to someone. He has caught himself staring at Eden a little too long, his heart missing a few beats when she smiles at him. Each day his attraction and affections for her grow that he can no longer deny it. But there are secrets that she keeps, secrets that are both terrifying and heartbreaking. How will they fare?
author: Joan Idris
